visa.title: Visa services
visa.card1.subtitle: Study Abroad
visa.card1.title: Student Visa
visa.card1.text: Full support for obtaining student visas to universities and programs abroad. We prepare documents, complete application forms, and track the process professionally.
visa.card2.subtitle: Travel & Tourism
visa.card2.title: Tourist Visa
visa.card2.text: We guide you through Schengen short-stay visas for travel, training, and business trips, ensuring documents, insurance, and proofs are correctly prepared.
visa.card3.subtitle: International Career
visa.card3.title: Work Visa
visa.card3.text: Step-by-step management of work visa applications, from job offer confirmation to documentation, translations, and application tracking.
visa.card4.subtitle: Family Reunification
visa.card4.title: Family Reunion Visa
visa.card4.text: Complete legal and technical assistance for family reunification visa applications, simplifying proof of relationships and consular requirements.
tech.title: Training Programs
tech.card1.title: DevOps Engineering Course – CI/CD and Cloud basics
tech.card1.desc: Learn the fundamentals of pipelines, automation, and cloud basics to deploy reliably.
tech.card2.title: UX/UI Design Course – User experience and interface design
tech.card2.desc: Learn research, wireframing, prototyping, and handoff for modern digital products.
tech.card3.title: QA Training – Manual and automated testing
tech.card3.desc: Build testing discipline with manual, automated, and CI-integrated quality workflows.
tech.card4.title: Back-end Programming – Python/Node.js, SQL
tech.card4.desc: Design APIs, work with databases, and ship scalable services in production.
tech.card5.title: Front-end Programming – HTML, CSS, JS, React
tech.card5.desc: Craft responsive interfaces, manage state, and ship performant web experiences.
tech.card6.title: Spanish Prep
tech.card6.desc: Speaking, listening, and grammar drills to build fluency for work and study.
tech.card7.title: IELTS
tech.card7.desc: Exam-focused preparation covering reading, writing, listening, and speaking.
tech.card8.title: English Prep
tech.card8.desc: Build everyday English for travel, work, and study with practical practice sets.
tech.card9.title: Data Mastering Bootcamp – Analytics, AI, and Automation
tech.card9.desc: Build end-to-end skills in data analysis, machine learning, and workflow automation.
scholarship.sub: Explore global scholarship options for Bachelor’s, Master’s, and PhD programs.
faq.desc: We’ve gathered the most common questions about our services, policies, and study abroad processes so you can find answers quickly.
faq.a1: We help you identify suitable scholarships and guide you through the application steps.
faq.q2: Can I work while studying abroad?
faq.a2: Work permissions depend on the country; we advise on rules and required permits.
faq.q3: What if I get rejected by a university?
faq.a3: We help you adjust your application, select alternatives, and reapply on time.
faq.q4: What documents are required for the application process?
faq.a4: We prepare a list for your CV, motivation letter, diploma/transcripts, and language certificates.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.card1.name: Rachel Green
testimonials.card1.text: The courses were excellent, but be ready - it moves quickly. I joined the back-end specialization and learned SQL, MongoDB, and authentication methods I hadn't even heard of.
testimonials.card2.name: Zahra Mammadova
testimonials.card2.text: Mentors were supportive and the projects felt close to real-world tasks. The career guidance sessions helped me polish my portfolio and interviews.
testimonials.card3.name: Elvin Rahimov
testimonials.card3.text: I switched from non-tech to front-end and the pace was perfect. Clear modules, code reviews, and a strong community made it smooth.
testimonials.card4.name: Leyla Sadigova
testimonials.card4.text: The DevOps bootcamp pushed me out of my comfort zone - in the best way. CI/CD, cloud, and monitoring labs were exactly what I needed for work.
